page.title: 16ST.LUKE'S SCHOOL S.REIGATE
page.content: St.Luke's Middle School in South Reigate is a Church of England School in the parish of that name.It takers children of 8 to 12.Built in 1953 as a junior school,it was extended in 1972 to become 2-form entry middle.It is situated on the edge of a residential area with open country to south and west.It is on a site of 13 acres,8\ of which are playing fields.It has its own enclosed,heated swimming pool. Af_ ter its amalgamation with Woodhatch Middle School in 1986 it will be the only middle school in the block. The school has eight classrooms,a home economics,craft workshop,science room,art room and library.The main hall is used for Assemblies,dinners and P.E..There are 4 houses named af_ ter saints Andrew,David,George and Patrick.There are annual examinations and reports.
